title: Hay Hay Hay 3! Fertilizing the Hay & Cattle Pastures! and our new 4th of July Calf!

tasks.task: Farm operations and counting hay bales.
subtasks: Walk through hay fields and count bales.
Move to different hay fields and record bale counts.
Take a shortcut between fields and check bale count.
Confirm total number of hay bales after thorough check.
Adjust hopper and conveyor belt systems.
Apply fertilizer at the correct rate using a spreader.
Identify a new calf at the farm.
Attempt to tag the new calf with an ear tag.
Check on other pregnant cows, including Oreo.
Plan and prepare for brush hogging operations.
Return rented equipment (fertilizer buggy) to the co-op.

tasks.task: Farm Operations and Counting Hay Bales**
